title: China’s troubled solar industry may be nearing a turning point
description: China’s solar manufacturers face a tough earnings season with combined losses of $2 billion. Overcapacity has driven prices down, leading to some companies restructuring. Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley predict factory closures and price stabilization. The industry seeks government intervention to help reallocate resources and regulate expansion.
